page.title: 16A Day With James Bradshaw
page.content:
Aged 14 years.
James Bradshaw is 14 years old. He is a pupil at Campion School Bugbrooke. James gets up at 6.45am, and he has a swer, gets dressed and goes downstairs for his breakfast. At 8.10 he catches the bus to school. He arrives at school at 8.25am. One of his lessons of the day is French, which he admits he is not very good at. He has a break in the morning lasting 15 minutes. His next lesson is Careers which he likes very much. After lunch he has an English lesson followed by a History lesson. In the evening he watches television and usually goes to see his friend. When he arrives back home he watches more television and goes to bed at 10.30pm.
